title: Power-derive expression for block on rough surface

content.question: A horizontal force is exerted on a block of mass <math alttext="m" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>m</mi></math>, initially at rest, causing the block to accelerate at a constant rate across a rough horizontal surface. Friction forces are negligible. After time <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi></math>, the block has speed <math alttext="v" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>v</mi></math> and has traveled a distance <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi></math>. Which of the following is a correct expression for the average power delivered to the block during the time <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction m v over t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi><mi>v</mi></mrow><mi>t</mi></mfrac></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="the fraction m v x over t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi><mi>v</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow><mi>t</mi></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction m v squared over t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi><msup><mi>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mi>t</mi></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction m v squared over 2 t, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi><msup><mi>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction m v squared over 2 t, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi><msup><mi>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
